item.title: Version Control: Started using git and github (and how to set-up a remote git server)
item.description: It’s been almost 6 years since I used some kind of version control system. Back then I wasn’t sure about which I wanted to useâ€¦ I settled with RCS, the father of them all. RCS was structurally simple, with text-based (human-readable) delta files. I liked that. I had all my code and TeX files under revision control, but then I started using more than one computer and it got out of hand quickly (using RCS or CVS in Windows was quite tricky and had user and encoding problems.)
